com.neu.prattle.service.group

Interface GroupService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupServiceImpl

    public interface GroupService
    Acts as an interface between the data layer and the servlet controller. The controller is responsible for interfacing with this instance to perform all the CRUD operations on Group accounts.
    Version:
    dated 2019-11-09
    Author:
    Chad

      • findGroupByName

        java.util.Optional<Group> findGroupByName(java.lang.String name)

        Returns:
